## Block.appendStatementInput() method

Shortcut for appending a statement input row.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
appendStatementInput(name: string): Input;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | Language-neutral identifier which may used to find this input again. Should be unique to this block. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Input](./blockly.input.md)
